name: wheather_app
description: > running applications > => just make sure your in root directory > => First Step open console and write command "npm install" > => second step write command "npm run dev" > Now you both frontend and backend server will start

scripts.install: concurrently "cd backend && npm i" "cd frontend && npm i"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
